00007 //  class.
00008 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00009 #include "Error.h"
00010 #include <stdio.h>
00011 
00012 namespace StorageKit {
00013 
00014 class TestError : public StorageKit::Error {
00015 public:
00016     TestError(const char* errorMessage = NULL) : StorageKit::Error(99, errorMessage) { };
00017 };
00018 
00019 };
00020 
00021 
00022 int main() {
00023 
00024     printf("\n");
00025 
00026     try {
00027         throw new StorageKit::TestError();
00028         printf("This text will never see the light of day\n");  
00029     }
00030     catch (StorageKit::TestError *e) {
00031         printf("Caught StorageKit::TestError:\n");
00032         printf(" e->ErrorCode() == %d\n", e->ErrorCode());
00033         printf(" e->ErrorMessage() == %s\n", e->ErrorMessage());
00034         delete e;
00035     }
00036     
00037     printf("\n");
00038 
00039     try {
00040         throw new StorageKit::TestError("This is a test!");
00041         printf("This text will never see the light of day\n");  
00042     }
00043     catch (StorageKit::Error *e) {
00044         printf("Caught StorageKit::Error:\n");
00045         printf(" e->ErrorCode() == %d\n", e->ErrorCode());
00046         printf(" e->ErrorMessage() == %s\n", e->ErrorMessage());
00047         delete e;
00048     }
00049     
00050     printf("\n");
00051 
00052     return 0;   
00053 
00054 }
